rukus.text: Taiyo ga tsutsumikakusa reru toki
Moroboshi ga ochiru toki
yamayama ga chiru toki
harande 10-kagetsu no mesu rakuda ga tokan ni sa reru toki
samazamana yaju ga (kyofu no amari)-gun o nashi atsumaru toki
Taiyo ga waki-tachi, afureru toki
sorezore no tamashi ga (nikutai to) kumiawasa reru toki
ikiume rarete ita (joji ga)
don'na tsumi de korosa reta ka to towa reru toki
(ten no) chobo ga, aka reru toki
ten ga hagi tora reru toki
goku hi ga hono o age sase rareru toki
rakuen ga chikadzuku toki
(sonotoki) subete no tamashi wa,-saki ni itta (zen'aku) no shogyo o shirudearou
Watashi wa shizumi yuku Moroboshi ni oite chikau
(Kido o) unko shite bossuru (Moroboshi ni oite)
kurayami o mukaeru yoru ni oite
yoake o mukaeru asa ni oite (chikau)
Hontoni kore (kuruan) wa, kokina shito (jiburiru) no (arra kara no) kotoba
(kare wa) gyokuza no omo no gozen de (songen sa reru chii no) za ni tsuku,-ryoku no aru
shitagawa re, shinrai sa reru (shitodearu)
(Hitobito yo) anata-kata no nakama (muhanmado) wa, kichigaide wanai
Kare wa, akarui chiheisen-jo ni hakkiri to kare (jiburiru) o mita
Kare wa yugen-kai (no shitte iru koto) o dashi ka shimanai
Sore (kuruan) wa, norowareta akuma no kotoba demonai
Sorenanoni anata gata wa (sorera no koto o shin'yo sezu) doko e iku no ka
Kore (kuruan) koso wa, ban'nin e no kyokun nihokanaranai
Sore wa anata gata no naka, dare demo tadashi michi o ayumitai to nozomu mono no tame no monodearu
Daga ban'yu no shu, arra no o nozomi ga nai kagiri, anata gata wa kore o nozomu koto mo dekinai nodearu
